issue.title: Duplicate SQL files crashes update
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

There's two files with identical content in SQL updates (for every DBMS).
They're both executed in case of update, the installer crashes on command that can't be run twice (column renaming for example..)

source:/tags/4.2.0-beta-1/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/updates/mysql/4.2.0-beta-1.sql
source:/tags/4.2.0-beta-1/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_core/src/administrator/sql/updates/mysql/4.2.0.sql

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
